reviewText: Watched these shows when first aired on network-they really hit home then. In some ways, even today, they touch and speak to that part of ourselves that longs for the relationship with Jesus Christ. If you are "riding the fence" in your beliefs, these may help push you off the fence to a real commitment to live the life our Lord desires for us.
summary: These episodes will carry you thru tough times

reviewText: Hear this people at Paramount Studios and Anyone Else Responsible For Getting the Touched By An Angel series out on DVD.......you've been dragging your feet, causing us all to wait impatientlysince the show ended!! Come on people?! SEVEN YEARS of waiting to have my favorite episodes is driving me to seriously consider buying from one of the many booters out there on the internet!And your response to fans like us demanding you get on the ball, by putting out episodes we may already have feels like a slap on the face. Come on guys! Get A move on will ya?
summary: Why I Too Am Not Buying This Set......
Title: N/A

reviewText: Touched by an Angel is one of my favorite shows.  I'd love to collect all the shows on DVD eventually.So why am I not buying this?  First, it's four episodes.  I've been buying other season box sets on sale for about the same price as this four episode collection.  The actual season box sets for this TV series are sloooooooowly being released in 1/2 season sets costing about twice as much as a they should.Listen up TBAA people!  You have an audience waiting to buy the season box sets if you are REASONABLE!  I can get full seasons of Supernatural or Heroes for less than 20 bucks each if you buy them at the right time.  Why is a 1/2 season of this show twice the price, or a four episode collection the same price?A classic show about the love of God and angels shouldn't be so greedy! I'm disappointed.  And if I'm voicing this opinion, keep in mind that there are others out there with the same opinion who would never bother to write a review.All told, there's a big lump of dissappointment in the air concerning the travesty of how this particular show has been poorly marketed, even by those writing rave reviews, saying things like, "I know it costs more, but this is such a great show, I'm willing to pay it," or "I wish they'd release the full season sets, but in the meantime, this is a good collection to tide us over..."  I'm not buying it.Oh well...There are other shows...
summary: Hmm, why am I not buying this when I LOVE the show?

reviewText: I Love this Television Show Touched By An Angel; Hollywood finially did something right for a change, back in the Decade of the 1980's.  I'm really ticked off with Hollywood for filming such Garbage / Trash.  If they had only continued to film Fabulious Television Shows and Movies like the Series " Touched By An Angel ", then they would be doing very well.  But instead, they go Waisting Money on filming ALL of the Garbage / Trash that they do now a days.  They really should have remained with Television Shows and Movies like Touched by An Angel and the Movies of Yesteryear!In my own Opinion, I say that in the end, those Edit's from Hollywood will" BURN IN HELL FOR ALL ETURNITY " for filming such Garbage / Trash!
